column4: Indus: Could I steal you for some help with ALSA too please, well when you are done helping Omar87
iam  a big noob to be honest but ill try to help
you can go ahead and ask though, i can handle 2 at one time :P
Me too, but it seems you know a little more then I do.
why did you install alsa that way?
It just seemed the easiest, Im still new to linux and I dont know how to compile from source and stuff
when you installed jaunty, wasnt sound working for you by default?
Yes it was, but when I would use skype my cpu usage would leap to 100% and then it would crash skype or some weird issues
i suggest you go back to default sound first otherwise its difficult to troubleshoot/ in skype you can set sound output to pulse and fiddle
actually I might have fixed my problem it was a typo on my part
but what was the exact problem you were facing?
Um just a typo, but other then that everything else works now. That script was really easy to get working and I didnt need to do much config
hmm ok cool. Good night indeed then for you :)
yes it shall be, is there something that I might be able to help you with?
heh nothing really, my ubuntu is working perfect almost :)
kk, I just thought id ask. Have a gnight and thanks for your help.
